name: LG UltraGear 27" OLED Gaming Monitor
description: 27-inch QHD OLED gaming monitor with 240Hz refresh rate and 0.03ms response time. Features perfect blacks, infinite contrast, and NVIDIA G-SYNC compatibility.

reviews.review_text: OLED gaming is a revelation. Colors and contrast are perfect.
240Hz OLED is the new gold standard.
Burn-in worry is overblown. Just use pixel refresh.
